remarks: A positive real is closed downwards under the positive fractions. Definition 9-3.1 (ii) of [Gleason] p. 121.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Feb-1996.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-May-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: prcdnq $p |- ( ( A e. P. /\ B e. A ) -> ( C <Q B -> C e. A ) ) $.
